data.text: Our family recently stayed for the third time at LEGOLAND® Hotel Dubai and had again a wonderful experience. The guest services team, especially Claussy and her team, were very attentive and welcoming, making our stay comfortable and enjoyable. This time we visited during Ramadan and celebrated our daughter's 8th birthday. The staff went out of their way to ensure the celebration was special, which we greatly appreciated. Our room was comfortable and perfectly themed for a fun family stay. A big Thank you to Claussy and the team for making our visit memorable. We recommend LEGOLAND® Hotel Dubai to any family looking for a friendly and enjoyable stay during any time of the year.
data.title: Amazing Family Stay at LEGOLAND® Hotel

user_location.name: Abu Dhabi, Emirate of Abu Dhabi

data.text:
Great Place for kids very friendly staff. Food was very good and kids enjoyed it to the max. Amenities are good the french quarter was also good. My son liked the room, elevator and treasure hunt

The only drawback is we got bit my moskitos inside the room.
data.title: Great place

data.text:
An excellent place for a family staycation!  We took our 4 year old son here and he had such a wonderful time.   From the lobby full of lego blocks, to the excellent pool and the themed room - it's a great place to take your kids.

Our Ninjago room was vibrantly designed with lots of colours and even a treasurehunt, where we had to work out the combination to open a safe which contained a surprise inside!

The stay may seem expensive, but the fact you get access to the theme park or water park for each night you stay, makes it worth it.  We chose the theme park and really enjoyed it.  It was open from 11am-7pm and the fact we could re-enter was perfect for day naps.  The hotel is just 2 mins walk from the theme park.

With regards to souvenirs, Lego can be costly so we appreciated how the shop had lots of little bags and value items that could be purchased with pocket money.

The staff are so friendly too and the restaurant buffet was good.
data.title: Perfect family staycation!

data.text: legoland hotel Dubai is a great place for family with kids, many activities for kids to enjoy, and close to all the parks. we have been here many times  and the kids just keep asking to come back. the room is enough for 5 person, planty space for family
data.title: great place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lin W,

It is great to know when guests enjoy their stay as you did. 

As you know, we always want to make sure we give all our valued guests the best memorable experience. 

Hoping to have you and your family back very soon. 

With my best regards, 

Claussy Del Castillo 
Hotel Excellence & Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Claussy Del Castillo

data.text: Booked a 2 night stay at the hotel with my grandson who is 5.  Had a very enjoyable stay with the room cleaned very well and had plenty of towels, bottled water etc topped up regularly. Wassem made sure everything was perfect for our stay and Ali cleaned the room so we had all that we needed
data.title: Great little staycation
